languages.text: "Дом Драйвстем, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, желает вам успеха и искренне рад, что может служить вам, как прежде служил достопочтенной Теодоре фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Дом Драйвстем, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, желает вам успеха и искренне рад, что может служить вам, как прежде служил достопочтенной Теодоре фон Валанциус".
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to serve you as they served the honourable Theodora von Valancius before you."
languages.original_text: "Дом Драйвстем, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, желает вам успеха и искренне рад, что может служить вам, как прежде служил достопочтенной Теодоре фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to be serving you as they served the honorable Theodora von Valancius before you."
traits.speaker: Steward

traits.locale_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to be serving you as they served the honorable Theodora von Valancius before you."
traits.speaker: Steward

traits.locale_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to serve you as they served the honourable Theodora von Valancius before you."
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: 「ドライブステン家は陛下より祝祭の手配を承っております。陛下に幸運が訪れますことを願い、高潔な先代、テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスにお仕えしたころと変わることなく、心から喜んで陛下にお仕えいたします」
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to serve you as they served the honourable Theodora von Valancius before you."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステン家は陛下より祝祭の手配を承っております。陛下に幸運が訪れますことを願い、高潔な先代、テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスにお仕えしたころと変わることなく、心から喜んで陛下にお仕えいたします」
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: “您已授权让德莱夫斯塔家族负责本次庆典。德莱夫斯塔家族祝您一切顺利，他们将不遗余力为您效劳，正如他们曾经全心全意地侍奉前任行商浪人西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯。”
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to serve you as they served the honourable Theodora von Valancius before you."

traits.locale_text: “您已授权让德莱夫斯塔家族负责本次庆典。德莱夫斯塔家族祝您一切顺利，他们将不遗余力为您效劳，正如他们曾经全心全意地侍奉前任行商浪人西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯。”
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: «La casa Drivestem, a la que ha encomendado los preparativos, le desea buena fortuna y se alegra de poder servirle del mismo modo en que sirvieron a la honorable Theodora von Valancius antes que a usted».
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to serve you as they served the honourable Theodora von Valancius before you."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Drivestem, a la que ha encomendado los preparativos, le desea buena fortuna y se alegra de poder servirle del mismo modo en que sirvieron a la honorable Theodora von Valancius antes que a usted».
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: « La maison Drivestem, que vous avez chargée d'organiser les festivités, vous souhaite bonne chance et se réjouit de vous servir au même titre qu'elle a servi l'honorable Théodora von Valancius avant vous. »
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to serve you as they served the honourable Theodora von Valancius before you."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Drivestem, que vous avez chargée d'organiser les festivités, vous souhaite bonne chance et se réjouit de vous servir au même titre qu'elle a servi l'honorable Théodora von Valancius avant vous. »
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: "Das Haus Drivestem, dem Ihr das Arrangement der Festlichkeiten übertragen habt, wünscht Euch viel Glück und ist ehrlich erfreut, Euch ebenso zu dienen wie der ehrbaren Theodora von Valancius vor Euch."
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to serve you as they served the honourable Theodora von Valancius before you."

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Drivestem, dem Ihr das Arrangement der Festlichkeiten übertragen habt, wünscht Euch viel Glück und ist ehrlich erfreut, Euch ebenso zu dienen wie der ehrbaren Theodora von Valancius vor Euch."
traits.speaker: Steward

languages.text: "Şenlik tertibi ile tevdi ettiğiniz Drivestem Hanesi, iyi talih diliyor ve onurlu Theodora von Valancius'a hizmet ettikleri gibi size de hizmetten samimiyetle hoşnut olduklarını belirtiyor."
languages.original_text: "House Drivestem, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes you good fortune and is sincerely delighted to serve you as they served the honourable Theodora von Valancius before you."

traits.locale_text: "Şenlik tertibi ile tevdi ettiğiniz Drivestem Hanesi, size iyi talih diliyor ve onurlu Theodora von Valancius'a hizmet ettikleri gibi size de hizmet etmekten samimiyetle hoşnut olduklarını belirtiyor."
traits.speaker: Steward
